metadata.name: LSASS Access Detected via Attack Surface Reduction

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (metadata.event_code = 1121 AND endswith(lower(process.file.path), lower('\\\\lsass.exe')) AND NOT (startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\temp\\\\asgard2-agent\\\\')) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\thor64.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\thor.exe'))) OR lower(LOWER(process.name)) in ('c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\atiesrxx\\.exe', 'c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\compattelrunner\\.exe', 'c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\msiexec\\.exe', 'c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\nvwmi64\\.exe', 'c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\svchost\\.exe', 'c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\taskmgr\\.exe', 'c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\wbem\\\\wmiprvse\\.exe', 'c:\\\\windows\\\\syswow64\\\\msiexec\\.exe') OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\driverstore\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\installer\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\program files\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\program files (x86)\\\\'))))

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Google Chrome GoogleUpdate.exe 2. Some Taskmgr.exe related activity Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/defender-endpoint/attack-surface-reduction
